org.araneaframework.jsp.tag.uilib.tree
Class TreeTag.StandardTreeRenderer

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.jsp.tag.uilib.tree.TreeTag.StandardTreeRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TreeRenderer
Enclosing class:
TreeTag
public static class TreeTag.StandardTreeRenderer
extends Object
implements TreeRenderer

Standard implementation of tree widget renderer that uses HTML unordered list <ul> and list item <li> tags.
